content: Does anyone know which is the status of nested workspaces support in Cargo. Is this something planned to support? Is anything preventing it? Nested and not Intersecting workspaces.

As I recall, we ( the cargo team ) would love to see work done on it! We are all for progress. We do not see fundamental problems. But it will require an RFC that lays out the corner cases and implications. It can happen after we have PR trying to figure out the implications.
This is my memory, others may remember differently.
Thanks a lot! Should start a thread in Rust Interals be a good start for the RFC preparation?
